description: Install the necessary dependencies for Circom.
Clone the Circom repository from GitHub.
Navigate to the Circom directory and build the project.
When the command successfully finishes, it generates the circom binary in the directory target/release. This command will install the circom binary in the directory $HOME/.cargo/bin.
To verify that Circom is correctly installed, run:
Install snarkjs. Snarkjs is a npm package that contains code to generate and validate ZK proofs from the artifacts produced by circom.
